gov.usgs.anss.edge

Class RTMSBuf

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.anss.edge.RTMSBuf

  • public class RTMSBuf
extends java.lang.Object
    this class encapsulates the data needed by the RawToMiniSeed static process addTimeseries. This class is used by the OOR software to store data packets and manipulate them as a block until they are ready to be sent to the RTMS. This class manages a pool of RTMSBufs so that they do not need to be created and discarded repeatedly

      • setRTMSBuf

        public void setRTMSBuf(int[] ts1,
                       java.lang.StringBuilder name,
                       int ns,
                       int yr,
                       int dy,
                       int sc,
                       int mics,
                       double rt,
                       int act,
                       int IOClk,
                       int qual,
                       int timeQual)
        Set the values of a RTMSBuf
        Parameters:
        ts1 - Timeseries array
        name - Seedname of the data
        ns - Number of samples in ts1
        yr - The year
        dy - The day of year of the start time
        sc - The seconds since midnight of the start time
        mics - The fraction of seconds in microseconds
        rt - The digitizing rate in Hz
        act - Activity flags
        IOClk - Clock flags
        qual - Quality flags
        timeQual - The timing quality (0-100)
